channel.title: code on Oh The Huge Manatee!
channel.description: Recent content in code on Oh The Huge Manatee!

item.title: The 3 skills you need to become a rock star developer
item.description: A lot is made of so-called “rockstar developers” in any given language or framework. They have a seemingly magical knowledge of the language and API, finding obscure methods and writing best-practice code as if by instinct. I’d like to lift the curtain on this: it’s not that hard to be this kind of rock star. You can do it, too… even without a fancy computer science degree. If you know how to code in a given language, you just need 3 skills and some patience.

item.title: Writing Drupal 8 code for Drupal 7
item.description: A year ago I proposed a session for Drupalcon Mumbai and Drupalcon New Orleans, called “The best of both worlds”. It promised to show attendees how to write Drupal 8 code for Drupal 7 sites. I never ended up giving the session, but this week I got an email asking for more information. So in case it ever comes up again, here’s my own collection of resources on the subject.
